original_text: They shall run like mighty men; they shall climb the wall like men of war; and they shall march every one on his ways, and they shall not break their ranks:
korean_text: 그들이 용사 같이 달리며 무사 같이 성을 기어 오르며 각기 자기의 길로 나아가되 그 줄을 이탈하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: They shall run like mighty men
they shall climb the wall like men of war
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 전사와 같이 성벽을 오를 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall march every one on his ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 각각 자기의 길로 행진할 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall not break their ranks
